ygData.subject: Re: Hammer of Wrath
ygData.msgSnippet: You can hit the ice boned skeleton with the hammer, I have done it.  You either didn t have the hammer in your melee hand, or you were bashing with a standard
ygData.messageBody:
You can hit the ice boned skeleton with the hammer, I have done it. You
either didn't have the hammer in your melee hand, or you were bashing with a
standard shield and it will say that the skeleton is invulnerable when you
are bashing. But otherwise, you should be able to hit the skeleton with the
hammer, although I would recommend haveing a party with you if that is your
only magic weapon.

Grod

-----Original Message-----
From: billy_kendall@...
[mailto:billy_kendall@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 9:19 AM
To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
Subject: [eqpaladin] Hammer of Wrath


From: billy_kendall@...

I have a question concerning the Hammer of Wrath. I just obtained 15th
level and the Hammer of Wrath spell. Now when i summon this thing and then
have it in my possesion I can right click it and it says that it is a MAGIC
ITEM, but I went to Befallen last night and when I tried to hit an Ice Boned
Skeleton with it, it said that the skele was invulnerable! I thought that I
would be able to hit creatures that were only susceptible to magic attack
with this hammer, you know, things like Willow Wisps and the such? Does
anyone know what the deal is with this?
